channel.title: Need help with new items i added
channel.description: OK well i added dragonfire shield on my project czar source, butt when i try to walk the shield just floats there and my arm moves, also when i special with my bandos god sword, it just stays in place and doesnt move, is there anyway i can fix this? if so please tell me

item.title: Need help with new items i added
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

try using an emote with the special like
pEmote = ##

But for the dragonfire sheild, it would always stay like that unless Silabsoft fixes it OR you can
make a client with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with new items i added
